signature: void putAll(Map<? extends K, ? extends V>)

enhanced_by.reason: The putAll method relies on the transformMap method to preprocess the input map before adding it to the decorated map.
The transformKey method is used within transformMap, which is invoked by putAll to transform keys in the input map.
The transformValue method is used within transformMap, which is invoked by putAll to transform values in the input map.
The putAll method internally calls the decorated map's putAll method after transforming the input map.
